name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 5th Generation Live ＂Twinkle 4 You＂ 【#ねぽらぼT4U】 [RRH29-R71T0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: A collection of fan messages and illustrations for the 'Twinkle 4 You' live event are displayed on screen.
Wait screen for the live performance featuring the four main members: Yukiyuki Lamy, Momosuzu Nene, Shishiro Botan, and Omaru Polka.
Pre-show announcements regarding venue rules, followed by a display of the event's merchandise lineup.
Wide shot of the concert hall filled with fans waving colored penlights in anticipation.
Commercial clip for Weiss Schwarz featuring Tokino Sora.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: Please wait a while for the show to start.

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ
subtitles.english: Attention: To all guests in attendance.

subtitles.original: 公演終了後は 規制退場を行います。
subtitles.english: A regulated exit will be conducted after the show.

subtitles.original: ヴァイスシュヴァルツ！
ホロライブプロダクションが...
